are_two_questions_duplicate.template: Given the question "{questions.text.0}" would you consider "{questions.text.1}" as a duplicate?

are_two_questions_same.template: Is the following question "{questions.text.0}" the same as "{questions.text.1}"?

rephrase_given_question.template: {% if is_duplicate == true%} Paraphrase the the following question: {% if questions.text.0|length < questions.text.1|length %}  {questions.text.0}

are_two_questions_different.template: The question "{questions.text.0}" is different from "{questions.text.1}". {"True"} or {"false"}?

true_or_false.template: The question "{questions.text.0}" is the same as "{questions.text.1}". {"True"} or {"false"} ?

yes_or_no.template: Two new posts asked on Quora are "{questions.text.0}" and "{questions.text.1}". I feel like they have asked the same question. Am I correct?
choices: Yes, they are the same question
